GSD.product_version: versions from v3.2 to before v5.10.154
GSD.description:
KVM: nVMX: Don't propagate vmcs12's PERF_GLOBAL_CTRL settings to vmcs02

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit 8364786152d5abf887162612c23f932d8cda164f, it was introduced in version v3.2 by commit 8bf00a529967dafbbb210b377c38a15834d1e979. For more details please see the references link.
